links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,15
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,40, if(isprime(3*n!+1),print(3*n!+1)))(PARI) { n=0; for (m=0, 10^5, if(isprime(a=3*m! + 1), write("b062551.txt", n++, " ", a); if (n==15, break)) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 08 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 10 2001
